author: AndrewKushnir
message:
ci: remove Stephen from PullApprove config (#41224)

This commit updates PullApprove config and removes Stephen from the list of reviewers.

PR Close #41224

files.patch:

          - petebacondarwin         # Pete Bacon Darwin

          - Splaktar                # Michael Prentice
-         - StephenFluin            # Stephen Fluin
          - twerske                 # Emma Twersky

       users:
         - aikidave
         - IgorMinar
-        - StephenFluin
+        - jelbourn
